title: PSA: If there's something strange, and you don't have wards...
body:
[](http://e-sports.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/1059229113.jpg)
And you die in ganks
Blame the jungler!

You overextend
And you lose your lane
There are still no wards
Blame the jungler!

Doodoot doodoot doodoot doodoot doot doot doodoodoot
Doodoot doodoot doodoot doot I ain't afraid of them ganks!

Doodoot doodoot doodoot doodoot doot doot doodoodoot
Doodoot doodoot doodoot doot I ain't afraid of them ganks!

If you're seeing things
In your minimap
But you still don't ward
Blame the jungler!

They have Evelynn
And Twitch ADC
You don't control ward
Blame the jungler!

Doodoot doodoot doodoot doodoot doot doot doodoodoot
Doodoot doodoot doodoot doot I ain't afraid of them ganks!

Doodoot doodoot doodoot doodoot doot doot doodoodoot
Doodoot doodoot doodoot doot I ain't afraid of them ganks!

http://i.imgur.com/CLN5WeU.png

replies.body: Instructions unclear. Dick stuck in support.
{{champion:63}} or {{champion:201}} or {{champion:44}} or {{champion:412}} or {{champion:12}} or {{champion:432}} or {{champion:53}} or {{champion:26}} ?
Embrace the healing power of AND
Oh my.
I got mine inside of all of malzs voidlings at the same time.
Bro that's how you get space AIDs
report jungler for not ganking every lane at 1:50

As Hecarim would say:

http://i.memeful.com/media/post/lMzjeJM_700wa_0.gif
The picture redeems the lyrics.

>The picture **enhances** the lyrics.

FTFY
Can't fix an opinion but whatever floats your boat.
I like it.
http://i.memeful.com/media/post/YMKD7RQ_700wa_0.gif

The problem I've had as a jungler, is that it's the same as Overwatch players blaming the support. You do what you can but in the end it's still your fault. and that's why i became a support main in LoL... in low-elo where everyone is a a boosted monkey
Lol tru. Nobody blames the support if something happens
{{champion:67}} does.
If the Vayne is any good then they would know how to kite it so at the very least you would have indirect fault over it
??? As a sup main, that's wishful thinking. Supports are often blamed. ADCs tend to be premadonna types unable to introspectively realize personal mistakes.
Well, everything's different for everyone
I actually don't see as much "blame the support" in games lately. Maybe the trend's dying out.
That's true, it's not as bad as previous seasons. Partially, probably, because of adc 2k17 luls.
Supports tend to be the SJW types carrying their victim card on their sleeve and using it to protect from retaliation after they insult everyone else.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/45/45b10a8986d571677b9261a3f97f72fe80c6d91fd69a2dc1289ff52737bb096f.jpg
But actually.
Hashinshin national anthem
Give the lyrics to instalock i want this tune.

"Doodoot doodoot doodoot doodoot doot doot doodoodoot
Doodoot doodoot doodoot doot I ain't afraid of them ganks!

Doodoot doodoot doodoot doodoot doot doot doodoodoot
Doodoot doodoot doodoot doot I ain't afraid of them ganks!"


I lost it.  I've totally considered typing music out like this to google a it when all I can think of is a tiny bit of a tune.  Seeing this renews my faith that I might actually find something that way.  This is amazing. xD
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> You don't control ward

{{item:3070}} {{item:3362}}

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

WP.

Came in looking for Ghostbusters thread, was not disappointed.

+1
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
If the enemy jungler is Lee just blame Riot for your 2 wards placed in a 70 minute game.
Dude you just made my day hahaha
